title: Anime champions
body:
I was wandering if the lol server could brings some of the **anime character** to this game. It might be more interesting and it might attract more players who loved the champions.

 some reccondmension:**Natsu** in the fairy tail and alot more

replies.body:
Riven's ultimate 'wind slash' is a direct reference to Inuyasha's tessaiga and 'wind scar' technique, 

Irelia's 'Hiten style' is a direct reference to Kenshin himura's 'Hiten mitsurugi style' 

Zac is a reference to Maijin Buu 

Katarina's 'Shunpo' is a direct reference to 'Shunpo' from Bleach 

Yasuo's rope belt is likely to be an indirect reference to Sasuke Uchiha's well known rope belt, also Yasuo wears armour on only one shoulder as does Lord Sesshomaru, and Sesshomaru and Inuyasha are rivals like Riven and Yasuo.

Bard's mask is a direct reference to princess mononoke as are his meeps.

Braum is a direct reference to Major Alex louis Armstrong the Strong Arm Alchemist.

Pulsefire Ezreal's taunt is a direct reference to the "its over 9000" quote from DBZ he is also voiced by adult Gohan from the same show.

Star guardian lux is a direct reference to sailor moon.

One of Karthus's taunts is a reference to Death note

Foxfire Ahri references nine tails state Naruto

one of Skarners quotes is a direct reference to Pokemon.

Its probable that Sona references Hatsune Miku (her dance in her ultimate skin is performed by Miku as well) 

Lucians Ultaime is a refetence to Coyote Staark's 'Cero Metralleta'

Wukong is derived from the same legend as Goku, his lore is also similar to Goku.

Varus could be a reference to Ashitaka.


these are just from memory, there are many more references as well but I'm not going to go through and find all of them right now
there are a few anime looking artwork as well like Red Riding Annie.
so there is already a lot of anime in the game, 
BUT THERE COULD BE SO MUCH MORE!!!!

@ Lord Sesshomaru

3 corrections, 

1. Wukong's lore goes by the original Chinese classic Jouney to the West, which it besides the character names and a few traits, doesn't really share much similarity or connection with the Dragon Ball anime series, especially after Goku became an adult.
2. Hatsune Miku is not an anime character, she is just a virtual persona created to represent a singing program (sharing music theme with Sona) of some sort for mostly easy recognition and marketing purposes. So I wouldn't say it's strictly an anime reference tbh.
3. Pokemon isn't really famous for its anime series though, it's the games that got the fame, rest are kinda just bonuses.

I am really not sure about Braum, since he is based on the community suggested champ originally called Angus. But whatever, I can let this one slide.

But yer the game definitely has quite a few anime references already, I gotta agree. 

EDIT: you forgot the best anime reference, TTGL Rumble though.

Wukong shares quite a few personality traits, with Goku as well as colour scheme, also if Riot is going to make a champion out of that old legend of course they are gong to look at other characters based off that legend and they wouldnt have forgotten the most famous of them all.

Hatusne Miku is not from an anime she is from vocaliod, however her drawing style is unreputably manga/anime. i never said she was an anime characters.
pokemon is best known for the games and the games did come first (before even the manga) but skarners quote is "Skar Skar Skarnerrr"
which is a reference to how pokemon say their names, this is more well known in the animo than the games, as in the games thy have their weird sound they make when they start a battle. and anyway it is an anime weather famous or not.

and yes i forgot Rumble D: and thats like one of the best ones D: how could i? D:

Well, Riven is sort of an anime character. Her lore is a classic story of betrayal, she has random white hair, and can also lift a ridiculously large sword with one hand while being able to do flips, spins, and other various combos.

Ahri is another one, except she is a fox girl.

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=A6N7HgET,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-11T03:03:02.289+0000)
>
> Ahri is another one, except she is a fox girl.

Not really, 9 tail fox exists in both Chinese, Japanese and Korean folk lores.

The version that Ahri was based on was Korean's interpretation of 9 tail fox.

She does have a skin that gives nods to anime however, the Foxfire Ahri is a reference to both Mozilla Firefox (web browser) and Naruto.
Yeah, but you cannot deny that she looks exactly like an anime character, what with the ears and face.

Porting straight from anime titles won't be done for various reasons, but taking influences is definitely possible.

It's not like the game doesn't have some of them already.

**EDIT**: 

Tbh I don't think it would happen a lot, seeing quality anime titles often involve minimal power creeping (which is not so ideal here as champs) or just too much stuff to be translated into the setting of LoL, as things can be very abstract or impossible to do in the level of games (the only game I know that succeeded was Asura's Wrath, but that was because 3/4 of the game was QTE).

 And I doubt they would just go and create champs based on not so original and inspiring titles.

So yer.
